step_data.thought:
I've successfully navigated to the Bestsellers Report page. Looking at the current page, I can see that there are no records found in the bestsellers list - the table shows 'We couldn't find any records.' This means there are currently no bestseller products to view or edit.

To proceed with my goal of viewing and editing product details from the bestsellers list, I need to:
1. First check if there are any products in the catalog
2. If there are products, I need to ensure that the report is properly configured to show bestsellers

Since I need to view and edit product details, I should navigate to the Catalog > Products section where I can see all products, not just bestsellers. From there, I can view and edit any product details.

I'll click on the CATALOG link in the navigation menu to access the products section.
